mdRecord.dcterms:title: Main Street, Floyd, VA.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A vintage picture post card that depicts the Main Street of Floyd, VA with gas pumps and cars in front of the stores. This postcard was published by The Floyd Drug Store, Floyd, VA and printed by Eagle Quality - The Eagle Post Card View Co., N. Y.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Street life
Streets
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
